attributes.action: Bring back the Golliwog, Baa Baa Black Sheep and everything else you have banned.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This government has gone mad - as did the previous government.
I was brought up with immigrants from the West Indies, India and Paskistan to name just three. At the time we had Robinson Jam with Golliwogs. Then someone really dumb declared Golliwogs were racist. Until then, nobody even gave racism a second thought.

We watched Saturday night TV which had the Black and Whites Minstrels. Then someone dumb and stupid declared the Black and White Minstrels were racist. Until then, nobody even thought of a connection between the black and white people of this country.

We learnt Nursey rhymes such as Baa Baa Blacksheep. Then someone really stupid in Government declared it was racist. Now its Baa Baa Green Sheep. Until then, nobody even gave racism a thought.

These are just three examples and there are many more. Our heritage and history are systematically being taken away from us. It is time this total nonsense is stopped and our traditions are restored.

Bring them all back.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
